13 double SaturatedTemperature::calculate() const {
14  const double C1 = 0.11670521452767E+04, C2 = -0.72421316703206E+06, C3 = -0.17073846940092E+02;
15  const double C4 = 0.12020824702470E+05, C5 = -0.32325550322333E+07, C6 = 0.14915108613530E+02;
16  const double C7 = -0.48232657361591E+04, C8 = 0.40511340542057E+06, C9 = -0.23855557567849E+00;
17  const double C10 = 0.65017534844798E+03;
18 
19  const double SS = std::pow(saturatedPressure, 0.25);
20  const double E = SS * SS + C3 * SS + C6;
21  const double F = C1 * SS * SS + C4 * SS + C7;
22  const double G = C2 * SS * SS + C5 * SS + C8;
23  const double D = 2 * G / (-F - std::sqrt(pow(F, 2) - 4 * E * G));
24 
25  return (C10 + D - std::sqrt(std::pow((C10 + D), 2) - 4 * (C9 + C10 * D))) / 2;
26 }
27 
28 double SaturatedPressure::calculate() const {
29  const double C1 = 0.11670521452767E+04, C2 = -0.72421316703206E+06, C3 = -0.17073846940092E+02;
30  const double C4 = 0.12020824702470E+05, C5 = -0.32325550322333E+07, C6 = 0.14915108613530E+02;
31  const double C7 = -0.48232657361591E+04, C8 = 0.40511340542057E+06, C9 = -0.23855557567849E+00;
32  const double C10 = 0.65017534844798E+03;
33 
34  const double v = saturatedTemperature + (C9 / (saturatedTemperature - C10));
35  const double vSquared = std::pow(v, 2);
36 
37  const double A = vSquared + (C1 * v) + C2;
38  const double B = (C3 * vSquared) + (C4 * v) + C5;
39  const double C = (C6 * vSquared) + (C7 * v) + C8;
40 
41  return std::pow((2 * C) / (-B + std::sqrt(std::pow(B, 2) - 4 * A * C)), 4);
42 }
43 
44 SteamSystemModelerTool::SaturatedPropertiesOutput SaturatedProperties::calculate() {
45  auto const gasProperties = SteamSystemModelerTool::region2(saturatedTemperature, saturatedPressure);
46  SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput liquidProperties;
47 
48  if ((saturatedTemperature >= SteamSystemModelerTool::TEMPERATURE_MIN)
49  && (saturatedTemperature <= SteamSystemModelerTool::TEMPERATURE_Tp)) {
50  liquidProperties = SteamSystemModelerTool::region1(saturatedTemperature, saturatedPressure);
51  }
52 
53  if ((saturatedTemperature > SteamSystemModelerTool::TEMPERATURE_Tp)
54  && (saturatedTemperature <= SteamSystemModelerTool::TEMPERATURE_CRIT)) {
55  liquidProperties = SteamSystemModelerTool::region3(saturatedTemperature, saturatedPressure);
56  }
57 
58  const double evaporationEnthalpy = gasProperties.specificEnthalpy - liquidProperties.specificEnthalpy;
59  const double evaporationEntropy = gasProperties.specificEntropy - liquidProperties.specificEntropy;
60  const double evaporationVolume = gasProperties.specificVolume - liquidProperties.specificVolume;
61 
62  return {saturatedTemperature, saturatedPressure, gasProperties.specificVolume, gasProperties.specificEnthalpy,
63  gasProperties.specificEntropy, liquidProperties.specificVolume, liquidProperties.specificEnthalpy,
64  liquidProperties.specificEntropy, evaporationVolume, evaporationEnthalpy, evaporationEntropy};
65 }
